lines.title: Lines
lines.description: List of fuel purchases made with the customer's e-wallets

totals.title: Totals
totals.description: Summary of all the purchases totals, including taxes (calculated)

FuelComplement.description: FuelComplement provides detailed information about fuel purchases made with electronic wallets.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Reference unit of measure used in the price and the quantity

price.title: Price
price.description: Base price of a single unit of the fuel

FuelItem.description: FuelItem provides the details of the fuel purchased.

wallet-id.title: Wallet Identifier
wallet-id.description: Identifier of the e-wallet used to make the purchase

purchase-date.title: Purchase Date
purchase-date.description: Date and time of the purchase

service-station-code.title: Service Station Code
service-station-code.description: Code of the service station where the purchase was made

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Result of quantity multiplied by the item's price (calculated)

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Map of taxes applied to the purchase

FuelLine.description: FuelLine represents a single fuel purchase made with an e-wallet issued by the invoice's supplier to the invoice's customer.

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Sum of all line item sums

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Sum of all document level discounts

charge.title: Charge
charge.description: Sum of all document level charges

tax_included.title: Tax Included
tax_included.description: If prices include tax, this is the total tax included in the price.

total.title: Total
total.description: Sum of all line sums minus the discounts, plus the charges, without tax.

taxes.title: Tax Totals
taxes.description: Summary of all the taxes included in the invoice.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Total amount of tax to apply to the invoice.

total_with_tax.title: Total with Tax
total_with_tax.description: Grand total after all taxes have been applied.

outlays.title: Outlay Totals
outlays.description: Total paid in outlays that need to be reimbursed

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total amount to be paid after applying taxes and outlays.

advance.title: Advance
advance.description: Total amount already paid in advance.

due.title: Due
due.description: How much actually needs to be paid now.

Totals.description: Totals contains the summaries of all calculations for the invoice.
